name: Undefined Behavior
description:
Game submission for Godot Wild Jam #10

Theme: Glitch

Play as a rat in a maze, but these mazes are a little glitchy! Abuse the game's glitches in order to win a game that may feel unwinnable.

Keys used: space/enter, arrow keys

Press the cheese in the upper right corner to pause the game

Godot Engine v3.1.beta7.official

Don't read this if you don't want  ANY hints on levels--------------------------

General hints: 

If you die enough times on a level, it will give you hints (except on the many cheeses level. That was just a mistake)

There are certain walls you can pass through and certain floor tiles you can't pass through

Teleporters are the key to victory on several levels

There's a pause-button glitch on one of the levels. Even if you time out, try pressing the pause button

Hint on the many cheeses level: Your cheese location is determined by the name you gave in the beginning (name is turned into ascii values in an array, added up, then modded by 62 to get location).  It will always be in the same location if you kept the same name. So basically, don't retry a section of cheese if you've already tried them and timed out on that level.

The 'choose the right potion' level is an homage to The Giant's Drink from Ender's Game, and this info may help you beat this level. Orson Scott Card is my favorite author <3

Sorry for no music :( Ran out of time.
